name: RETRO Shooter (Nezt50)
description:
RETRO Shooter is, you guessed it, a retro shooter game. Play as a rookie space ranger shooting your way to the R.E.T.R.O. Empire HQ to take them down! How far can you go before going down?

 -Endlessly shoot your way through enemy ships!

-Super Gameboy Colors.

-Speed up the longer you're there!

-Try to beat your own high score!
